title: Trading Strategies For Volatile Markets
description: Investor’s Business Daily chief content officer Chris Gessel and IBD’s multimedia content editor, Alissa Coram, discuss trading strategies to help your portfolio navigate choppy market waters. Plus, how to find the next crop of leaders and a key sell rule to maximize gains in a winning stock.
